dialogues.text: Ugh, why hasn't she come back yet? When she returns, I've got to...
Huh? What happened? You seem troubled.
I suppose nothing escapes your notice, Seele.
Lately, since everyone seems to have some free time, I want to throw a party to thank them for taking care of me.
I'm thinking about what preparations I should make for this party.
It's my first time inviting so many friends, so I'm feeling a bit nervous.
A party? If they are to pester you for stories like children again, we won't need much preparation...
But we need more than stories to treat our guests! Maybe I should host a tea party, just like in the fairy tales!
If that's the case, the room should be beautifully decorated, and I'll need to prepare a lot of food for the tea party. Hmm, what should I make?
Hey, wait, don't ignore what I said!
